#Data Imports
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

#Data Frame
bond = pd.read_csv("../input/bond-girls-age-and-film-data/bond_girls.csv")
bond.head()
bond.describe(include = 'all')
source.49c8d660:
plt.figure(figsize=(10,10), dpi=300)
sns.countplot(x= 'bond_actor', data = bond, palette ='rocket')
plt.title("Which Actor plays James Bond the Most 1962-2021?")

plt.xlabel("Actor", fontsize = 10)
plt.ylabel("Appearance", fontsize = 10)
plt.ylim(0,25)

plt.show()
source.8c1cfd08:
plt.figure(figsize =(100,100), dpi = 100)
sns.countplot(x = "bond_girl_name", data = bond, palette = 'rocket')
plt.title("Which Actress plays the Bond Girl the Most 1962-2021?", fontsize =100)
plt.xlabel("Actress" , fontsize = 100)
plt.ylabel("Appearance", fontsize = 100)

plt.show()
plt.savefig("bond_girl_appearance.png")
source.724a5cb1: Out of seventy actress, each actress has only played the Bond Girl once only!
